text: Liliana Focas Flavio Angelo Ducas Comneno de Curtis di Bisanzio Gagliardi (10 May 1933 â€“ 3 June 2022), commonly known as Liliana de Curtis, was an Italian actress and writer. De Curtis appeared in the movie Saint John, the Beheaded in 1940 and appearing in the 1954 movie Orient Express. De Curtis died in her home in Rome on 3 June 2022, at the age of 89. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Italian movie actors Category:Actors from Rome
title: Liliana de Curtis
